properties.name: tfi.annotation.enabled
properties.description: Enable TFI annotation processing (@TfiTask AOP aspect).

properties.name: tfi.context.max-age-millis
properties.description: Maximum age of context entries in milliseconds (default: 1 hour).

properties.name: tfi.context.leak-detection-enabled
properties.description: Enable leak detection for context entries. Recommended for production with thread pools.

properties.name: tfi.context.leak-detection-interval-millis
properties.description: Interval between leak detection checks in milliseconds.

properties.name: tfi.context.cleanup-enabled
properties.description: Enable automatic cleanup of expired context entries. Recommended for thread-pool-intensive environments.

properties.name: tfi.context.cleanup-interval-millis
properties.description: Interval between cleanup operations in milliseconds.

properties.name: tfi.security.spel-max-length
properties.description: Maximum allowed SpEL expression length. Expressions exceeding this limit are rejected.

properties.name: tfi.security.spel-max-nesting
properties.description: Maximum allowed bracket nesting depth in SpEL expressions.

properties.name: tfi.security.spel-cache-max-size
properties.description: Maximum number of compiled SpEL expressions to cache (LRU eviction).

properties.name: tfi.security.spel-blocked-patterns
properties.description: Blocked keyword patterns in SpEL expressions. Expressions containing any of these patterns are rejected.

properties.name: tfi.security.sensitive-keywords
properties.description: Sensitive field name keywords for data masking. Fields matching any keyword will be automatically masked.
